trans-unit.source: This topic displays the cmdlets in the <system>ExpressRoute</system> module for Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic displays the cmdlets in the <system>ExpressRoute</system> module for Windows PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Gets information about an authorized circuit.
trans-unit.target: Gets information about an authorized circuit.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object with bgp configuration information of an ExpressRouteCircuit
trans-unit.target: Returns an object with bgp configuration information of an ExpressRouteCircuit

trans-unit.source: Lists all ExpressRoute circuits and details of each circuit.
trans-unit.target: Lists all ExpressRoute circuits and details of each circuit.

trans-unit.source: Lists the link state of a particular virtual network and an ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Lists the link state of a particular virtual network and an ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: If a virtual network name is not specified, it lists all virtual networks linked to a particular ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: If a virtual network name is not specified, it lists all virtual networks linked to a particular ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Gets details of an existing authorization.
trans-unit.target: Gets details of an existing authorization.

trans-unit.source: Lists all ExpressRoute service providers including carriers and internet exchange points offering connectivity across all regions in Windows Azure.
trans-unit.target: Lists all ExpressRoute service providers including carriers and internet exchange points offering connectivity across all regions in Windows Azure.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new BGP peering configuration for an ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new BGP peering configuration for an ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new ExpressRoute circuit in a Windows Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new ExpressRoute circuit in a Windows Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: Creates a link between an ExpressRoute circuit and a virtual network in the current Windows Azuresubscription.
trans-unit.target: Creates a link between an ExpressRoute circuit and a virtual network in the current Windows Azuresubscription.

trans-unit.source: Authorizes other users to use your ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Authorizes other users to use your ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Adds authorized users to an existing link authorization.
trans-unit.target: Adds authorized users to an existing link authorization.

trans-unit.source: Removes the routing configuration for an ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Removes the routing configuration for an ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Removes an ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Removes an ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Removes the link between a Virtual Network and an ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Removes the link between a Virtual Network and an ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Removes a link authorization for a dedicated circuit.
trans-unit.target: Removes a link authorization for a dedicated circuit.

trans-unit.source: Removes the authorization for a user to create dedicated circuit links.
trans-unit.target: Removes the authorization for a user to create dedicated circuit links.

trans-unit.source: Updates a BGP peering configuration for an ExpressRoute circuit.
trans-unit.target: Updates a BGP peering configuration for an ExpressRoute circuit.

trans-unit.source: Updates or creates a link authorization for a dedicated circuit.
trans-unit.target: Updates or creates a link authorization for a dedicated circuit.
